item.title: How to Change Gmail Notification Action from Archive to Delete
item.description: Requirement You can choose Archive or Reply in Gmail's default notification actions. But you can change it. Solution Open Gmail App's General setting, change the *Default email notification action". The default action is Archive, you can change it to Delete. After the configuration, you can delete mail in Gmail's notification. What's next It's better to enable bothe Archive and Delete in notification.

item.title: Android Gmail Notification Actions (Archive, Delete, ...)
item.description: 需求 In previous artiche, we know we can change archive to delete in the Email(Gmail) notification of Android (Reference: http://dennys.github.io/en/doc/android/gmail-notify-delete-archive/) But we cannot enable BOTH, therefore, I try to find a solution in other Apps. K-9 Mail, ( K-9 Mail Joins The Thunderbird Family ) FairEmail Gmail Let's review Gmail's ability, the default action is Archive. Open Gmail App's General setting, change the *Default email notification action". The default action is Archive, you can change it to Delete.

item.title: How to Change Android Default YouTube App (YouTube Vanced, New Pipe, ...)
item.description: Notice This solution is only for Android 11 or below!!! Please use Better Open With in Android 12 or above. Requirement Android's default YouTube App is not very convenient, there are lots of Open Source alternatives (YouTube Vanced (removed), NewPipe, ...), although you can install them, if you don't change the default YouTube App, it's still inconvenient. Solution Android Settings -> Apps -> Default apps -> Opening links It will list all Apps, choose YouTube, and you will see the following screen.
